Package us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.events.business

package us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.events.business
Package holding all Novaconomy API Events related to Businesses

  • Class
    Description
    BusinessAdvertiseEvent
    Called when a Business is advertised
    BusinessCreateEvent
    Called when a Business is created
    BusinessEvent
    Represents an Event with a Business involved
    BusinessProductAddEvent
    Called before a Business Product is created
    BusinessProductRemoveEvent
    Called when a Business Product is removed
    BusinessSettingChangeEvent
    Called after a setting for a business is changed
    BusinessStockEvent
    Called when a Player attempts to stock a Business
    BusinessSupplyEvent
    Called before a Business receives an automatic supply from a container, adding the items to its resources.
    BusinessSupplyEvent.Interval
    Supported intervals for the Supply Event to take place
    BusinessTeleportHomeEvent
    Called before a Player teleports to a Business's Home.
    BusinessViewEvent
    Called when a Business is Viewed by a player that does not own the Business.
